verses.verse: וַיֹּ֙סֶף֙ <S%H3254><s%> And again אַף־ <S%H639><s%> the anger יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לַחֲר֖וֹת <S%H2734><s%> was kindled בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> against Israel וַיָּ֨סֶת <S%H5496><s%> and he moved אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דָּוִ֤ד <S%H1732><s%> David בָּהֶם֙ לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> against them to say לֵ֛ךְ <S%H1980><s%> Go מְנֵ֥ה <S%H4487><s%> number אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> and Judah

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> For the king אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יוֹאָ֣ב ׀ <S%H3097><s%> to Joab שַׂר־ <S%H8269><s%> the captain הַחַ֣יִל <S%H2428><s%> of the host אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who אִתּ֗וֹ <S%H854><s%> for שֽׁוּט־ <S%H7751><s%> which [was] with him Go now through נָ֞א <S%H4994><s%> now בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all שִׁבְטֵ֤י <S%H7626><s%> all the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מִדָּן֙ <S%H1835><s%> from Dan וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against בְּאֵ֣ר שֶׁ֔בַע <S%H884><s%> even to Beersheba וּפִקְד֖וּ <S%H6485><s%> and number אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> ye the people וְיָ֣דַעְתִּ֔י <S%H3045><s%> that I may know אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> מִסְפַּ֥ר <S%H4557><s%> the number הָעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> of the people ס

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יוֹאָ֜ב <S%H3097><s%> And Joab אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> unto the king וְיוֹסֵ֣ף <S%H3254><s%> add יְהוָה֩ <S%H3068><s%> Now the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֨יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָעָ֜ם <S%H5971><s%> unto the people כָּהֵ֤ם ׀ <S%H1992><s%> how many soever וְכָהֵם֙ <S%H1992><s%> like מֵאָ֣ה <S%H3967><s%> A hundred פְעָמִ֔ים <S%H6471><s%> times וְעֵינֵ֥י <S%H5869><s%> and that the eyes אֲדֹנִֽי־ <S%H113><s%> of my lord הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king רֹא֑וֹת <S%H7200><s%> may see וַאדֹנִ֣י <S%H113><s%> [it] but why doth my lord הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king לָ֥מָּה <S%H4100><s%> why חָפֵ֖ץ <S%H2654><s%> delight בַּדָּבָ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> act הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this

וַיֶּחֱזַ֤ק <S%H2388><s%> prevailed דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> word הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> Notwithstanding the king's אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against יוֹאָ֔ב <S%H3097><s%> against Joab וְעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> and against שָׂרֵ֣י <S%H8269><s%> and against the captains הֶחָ֑יִל <S%H2428><s%> of the host וַיֵּצֵ֨א <S%H3318><s%> went out יוֹאָ֜ב <S%H3097><s%> And Joab וְשָׂרֵ֤י <S%H8269><s%> and the captains הַחַ֙יִל֙ <S%H2428><s%> of the host לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> from the presence הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of the king לִפְקֹ֥ד <S%H6485><s%> to number אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> the people אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וַיַּעַבְר֖וּ <S%H5674><s%> And they passed over אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיַּרְדֵּ֑ן <S%H3383><s%> Jordan וַיַּחֲנ֣וּ <S%H2583><s%> and pitched בַעֲרוֹעֵ֗ר <S%H6177><s%> in Aroer יְמִ֥ין <S%H3225><s%> on the right side הָעִ֛יר <S%H5892><s%> of the city אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> is in בְּתוֹךְ־ <S%H8432><s%> that [lieth] in the midst הַנַּ֥חַל <S%H5158><s%> of the river הַגָּ֖ד <S%H1410><s%> of Gad וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and toward יַעְזֵֽר׃ <S%H3270><s%> and toward Jazer

וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> Then they came הַגִּלְעָ֔דָה <S%H1568><s%> to Gilead וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and to the land תַּחְתִּ֖ים חָדְשִׁ֑י <S%H8483><s%> of Tahtimhodshi וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> and they came דָּ֣נָה יַּ֔עַן <S%H1842><s%> to Danjaan וְסָבִ֖יב <S%H5439><s%> and about אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to צִידֽוֹן׃ <S%H6721><s%> to Zidon

וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> And came מִבְצַר־ <S%H4013><s%> to the strong hold צֹ֔ר <S%H6865><s%> of Tyre וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עָרֵ֥י <S%H5892><s%> and to all the cities הַחִוִּ֖י <S%H2340><s%> of the Hivites וְהַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֑י <S%H3669><s%> and of the Canaanites וַיֵּֽצְא֛וּ <S%H3318><s%> and they went out אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to נֶ֥גֶב <S%H5045><s%> to the south יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah בְּאֵ֥ר שָֽׁבַע׃ <S%H884><s%> [even] to Beersheba

וַיָּשֻׁ֖טוּ <S%H7751><s%> So when they had gone בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> the whole הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> through all the land וַיָּבֹ֜אוּ <S%H935><s%> they came מִקְצֵ֨ה <S%H7097><s%> at the end תִשְׁעָ֧ה <S%H8672><s%> of nine חֳדָשִׁ֛ים <S%H2320><s%> months וְעֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> and twenty י֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> days יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> to Jerusalem

וַיִּתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> gave up יוֹאָ֛ב <S%H3097><s%> And Joab אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִסְפַּ֥ר <S%H4557><s%> the sum מִפְקַד־ <S%H4662><s%> of the number הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> of the people אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> unto the king וַתְּהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> were in יִשְׂרָאֵ֡ל <S%H3478><s%> and there were in Israel שְׁמֹנֶה֩ <S%H8083><s%> eight מֵא֨וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred אֶ֤לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand אִֽישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> and the men חַ֙יִל֙ <S%H2428><s%> valiant שֹׁ֣לֵֽף <S%H8025><s%> that drew חֶ֔רֶב <S%H2719><s%> the sword וְאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> men יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah חֲמֵשׁ־ <S%H2568><s%> [were] five מֵא֥וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand אִֽישׁ׃ <S%H376><s%> men

וַיַּ֤ךְ <S%H5221><s%> smote לֵב־ <S%H3820><s%> heart דָּוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> And David's אֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> אַחֲרֵי־ <S%H310><s%> him after כֵ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> after that סָפַ֣ר <S%H5608><s%> that he had numbered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> the people ס וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said דָּוִ֜ד <S%H1732><s%> And David אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD חָטָ֤אתִי <S%H2398><s%> I have sinned מְאֹד֙ <S%H3966><s%> greatly אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> what עָשִׂ֔יתִי <S%H6213><s%> in that I have done וְעַתָּ֣ה <S%H6258><s%> now יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> and now I beseech thee O LORD הַֽעֲבֶר־ <S%H5674><s%> take away נָא֙ <S%H4994><s%> please אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲוֹ֣ן <S%H5771><s%> the iniquity עַבְדְּךָ֔ <S%H5650><s%> of thy servant כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for נִסְכַּ֖לְתִּי <S%H5528><s%> foolishly מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> for I have done very

וַיָּ֥קָם <S%H6965><s%> was up דָּוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> For when David בַּבֹּ֑קֶר <S%H1242><s%> in the morning פ וּדְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> the word יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD הָיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about גָּ֣ד <S%H1410><s%> Gad הַנָּבִ֔יא <S%H5030><s%> came unto the prophet חֹזֵ֥ה <S%H2374><s%> seer דָוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> David's לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

וַיָּבֹא־ <S%H935><s%> came גָ֥ד <S%H1410><s%> So Gad אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to דָּוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> to David וַיַּגֶּד־ <S%H5046><s%> and told ל֑וֹ וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> him and said ל֡וֹ הֲתָב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> come לְךָ֣ שֶֽׁבַע <S%H7651><s%> unto him Shall seven שָׁנִ֣ים ׀ <S%H8141><s%> years רָעָ֣ב ׀ <S%H7458><s%> of famine בְּאַרְצֶ֡ךָ <S%H776><s%> common אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <S%H7969><s%> three חֳ֠דָשִׁים <S%H2320><s%> months נֻסְךָ֨ <S%H5127><s%> flee לִפְנֵֽי־ <S%H6440><s%> before צָרֶ֜יךָ <S%H6862><s%> thine enemies וְה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> they רֹדְפֶ֗ךָ <S%H7291><s%> while they pursue וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo הֱ֠יוֹת <S%H1961><s%> become שְׁלֹ֨שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> thee? or that there be three יָמִ֥ים <S%H3117><s%> days' דֶּ֙בֶר֙ <S%H1698><s%> pestilence בְּאַרְצֶ֔ךָ <S%H776><s%> common עַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> henceforth דַּ֣ע <S%H3045><s%> consider וּרְאֵ֔ה <S%H7200><s%> and see מָה־ <S%H4100><s%> what אָשִׁ֥יב <S%H7725><s%> I shall return שֹׁלְחִ֖י <S%H7971><s%> to him that sent דָּבָֽר׃ <S%H1697><s%> what answer ס

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said דָּוִ֛ד <S%H1732><s%> And David אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to גָּ֖ד <S%H1410><s%> unto Gad צַר־ <S%H6862><s%> adversary לִ֣י מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> I am in a great נִפְּלָה־ <S%H5307><s%> let us fall נָּ֤א <S%H4994><s%> now בְיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> now into the hand יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for רַבִּ֣ים <S%H7227><s%> [are] great [רַחֲמֹו כ] (רַֽחֲמָ֔יו <S%H7356><s%> tender love ק) וּבְיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> into the hand אָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> of man אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not אֶפֹּֽלָה׃ <S%H5307><s%> and let me not fall
